snippet: In broadening the military operation beyond Iraq, President Obama moves the country back onto a war footing.
abstract: Editorial warns that Pres Obama's authorization of airstrikes in Syria, while prompted by legitimate fears, carries substantial and unpredictable risks that many Americans may not be willing to bear; holds that operation demands congressional approval, formation of international coalition that includes Arab states and Western allies and clear-eyed discussion of monetary costs.
lead_paragraph: In broadening the military operation beyond Iraq, President Obama moves the country back onto a war footing.
